price: Na walisema: Kwa nini hakutuletea muujiza kutoka kwa Mola wake Mlezi? Je! Haikuwafikilia dalili wazi ya yaliyomo katika Vitabu vya kale?.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا يَأۡتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ تَأۡتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā yatīnā biāyatin min rabbihi awalam tatihim bayyinatu mā fī al-ṣuḥufi al-ūlā
